scripts.generate: bunx prisma generate --schema ../../packages/prisma/cuestecitas/schema.prisma && bunx prisma generate --schema ../../packages/prisma/valledupar/schema.prisma && bunx prisma generate --schema ../../packages/prisma/core/schema.prisma
scripts.migrate: bunx prisma migrate dev --schema ../../packages/prisma/cuestecitas/schema.prisma && bunx prisma migrate dev --schema ../../packages/prisma/valledupar/schema.prisma && bunx prisma migrate dev --schema ../../packages/prisma/core/schema.prisma
scripts.deploy: bunx prisma migrate deploy --schema ../../packages/prisma/cuestecitas/schema.prisma && bunx prisma migrate deploy --schema ../../packages/prisma/valledupar/schema.prisma && bunx prisma migrate deploy --schema ../../packages/prisma/core/schema.prisma
